name: stripchar
description: strip special character from string - Javascipt - Node.js
readme:
## Description
```

stripchar is perhaps the smallest Github Repositor, when you are working with Javascript | Node.js
you can simply replace all special characters from string by using this repo.


```
## Installation
```
npm install stripchar


```
## Require
```
var sanitizer = require('stripchar');


```
## Use
```
stripchar.strip(inputString, replaceWith); // Strip all the special characters
